Keyboard shortcuts for TablePlus app

A visual cheat-sheet for the 34 keyboard shortcuts found in TablePlus

Original Reference Report Issue

Global

Open a new connection

  • Ctrl
  • N

Quit app

  • Ctrl
  • Q

Open SQL file

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • O

Open Preferences

  • Ctrl
  • ,

Workspace

Close a tab/window

  • Ctrl
  • W

Commit the changes

  • Ctrl
  • S

Open a new tab

  • Ctrl
  • T

Open plugin manager

  • Ctrl
  • L

Run custom script

  • Ctrl
  • .

Reload workspace

  • Ctrl
  • R

Navigate to left tab

  • Ctrl
  • [

Navigate to right tab

  • Ctrl
  • ]

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • [

Navigate to right Pane

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • ]

Split Pane horizontally

  • Ctrl
  • D

Navigate to number tab

  • Ctrl
  • 1-9

Switch database

  • Ctrl
  • K

Switch connection

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • K

  • Ctrl
  • I

  • Ctrl
  • E

  • Ctrl
  • O

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • Enter

  • Ctrl
  • \

  • Z

  • Ctrl

  • E

  • (click)

  • Tab
